General.Name: ITE Tech Inc
General.Description: ITE Tech. Inc, a fabless IC design company, provides I/O, keyboard, and embedded controller technology products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers video link products, including HDMI, display port, MIPI, and high-speed ADC/DAC products; PC I/O and notebook product lines; and digital TV products, such as DTV modulators, front-end receivers, and bridges. The company also provides ccHDTV transmitters and receivers; USB type C products; EPD e-paper IC products; SoC; and sensor hub/IOT products. ITE Tech. Inc was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 13, Chuangsin 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30076
